entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Becoming sunny in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 27 March 2023
